title: [GAMEPLAY] Nidalee spear not visible
body: Nidalee's spear is not visible when she autoattacks or throws her Q. When she uses Q we can only see the light that comes under the spear but not the spear itself.

replies.body:
I had this issue playing against a warring kingdoms Nidalee.
I was playing as classic Nidalee and didn't have the issue for my spears.
I've included a DXDiag.
It is in finnish but hope you understand something :).

Thanks for the report!

This appears to be a graphics error that's not occurring on all machines. Would you mind attaching your DXDiag so we can get a bit more info? :3
